title: Lunar Diplomacy/Quick guide

properties.name: description
properties.value: Note: You must keep your seal of passage, once obtained, on you at all times while on the Lunar Isle. If you do not, you will be teleported off of the isle if you try to talk to any NPC.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Lunar Diplomacy/Quick guide
 This quick guide has an in-depth guide here.
It contains a more detailed description of dialogue, cutscenes, and storyline.

Details[edit | edit source]

Start point Go to the westernmost dock of Rellekka, and talk to Lokar.
Official difficultyExperienced
DescriptionCan you make it to Moonclan Island and make peace between the Moonclan and the Fremenniks?
Official lengthLong
Requirements
  • Completion of the following quests:
    • The Fremennik Trials
    • Lost City
    • Rune Mysteries
    • Shilo Village
      • Jungle Potion
        • Druidic Ritual
  • 5 Herblore (not boostable)
  • 61 Crafting (not boostable)
  • 40 Defence (not boostable)
  • 49 Firemaking (not boostable)
  • 65 Magic (not boostable)
  • 60 Mining (not boostable)
  • 55 Woodcutting (not boostable)
    Note: Lokar will not talk to you if you do not have all of the required non-boostable stats.
  • The ability to kill multiple level 111 monsters.
  • Access to the following runic altars:
    • Air
    • Earth
    • Fire
    • Water
Items required
  • A tinderbox
  • A few coins (1,000 is enough)
  • A guam leaf (potential drop from a Suqah during the quest)
  • A marrentill (potential drop from a Suqah during the quest)
  • A pestle and mortar
  • A hammer
  • Two spools of thread (obtainable during quest)
  • A needle (obtainable during quest)
  • Any axe (bronze axe obtainable during quest)
  • Any pickaxe
  • A spade
  • A bullseye lantern (NOT (unf) NOR (empty). If you cannot obtain one, bring means to get to a lamp oil still instead. Swamp tar can be obtained during the quest.)
  • All elemental talismans or their respective tiaras (Air, Water, Earth and Fire, or an Elemental talisman), or access to the Abyss
  • A dramen staff
  • Runes for the final boss fight as Lunar equipment must be worn (elemental staves not equippable)
  • Combat equipment
Recommended
  • 50 Combat level
  • Enchanted lyre (obtained during The Fremennik Trials), Fremennik sea boots, Rellekka teleport tablets, or other means to return to Rellekka
  • Extra dramen staves (if interested in making more lunar staves for free)

If you cannot obtain a bullseye lantern, bring:

  • Teleport to House runes/tablet (if POH is in Rimmington, redirection scrolls if not) or other means to get to Rimmington.
Enemies to defeat
  • Multiple Suqah (level 111)
  • Me (level 79)

[[Swamp tar]] can be obtained during the quest.)\n*All elemental talismans or their respective tiaras ([[Air talisman|Air]], [[Water talisman|Water]], [[Earth talisman|Earth]] and [[Fire talisman|Fire]], or an [[Elemental talisman]]), or access to the [[Abyss]]\n*A [[dramen staff]]\n*[[Runes]] for the final boss fight as [[Lunar equipment]] '''must''' be worn (elemental staves not equippable)\n*[[Combat]] equipment"}

Walkthrough[edit | edit source]

Note: You must keep your seal of passage, once obtained, on you at all times while on the Lunar Isle. If you do not, you will be teleported off of the isle if you try to talk to any NPC.

The lantern given during the quest does not come with oil in it, so bring a lightable regular bullseye lantern. If you put the emerald lens in the given lantern, drop it and ask for a new lens, which you then use on your working brought bullseye lantern.

Starting out[edit | edit source]

Items needed for this part of the quest: Tinderbox, Bullseye lantern (one that you can light).

Recommended: House teleport tablet or runes.

  • Talk to Lokar Searunner on the western most Rellekka docks. ( 2•1•1)…
    2You've been away from these parts a while?
    1Why did you leave?
    1Why not, I've always wondered what the state of my innards are!
  • Speak to Brundt the Chieftain in the Longhall for a seal of passage. ( 1)…
    1Ask about a Seal of Passage.
  • Return to Lokar. ( 1)…
    1Arrr! Yar! Let's be on our way, yar!
  • Climb the ladders, and board the pirate ship. Talk to Captain Bentley about sailing to Lunar Isle. ( 4)…
    4Can we sail to Lunar Isle now?
  • Speak to Captain Bentley again.
  • Climb down the nearby south stairs through the door, talk to 'Birds-Eye' Jack.
  • Climb back up the stairs and talk to Captain Bentley again. ( 2)…
    2Perhaps it's the Navigator's fault?
  • Climb back down the stairs and return to 'Birds-Eye' Jack again.
  • Climb back up the stairs and report back to Captain Bentley.

Talking to the crew[edit | edit source]

NOTE: MUST talk to them in order.

  • Talk to 'Eagle-eye' Shultz at the very front (north-end) of the ship.
  • Talk to the Cabin boy up one deck from the captain (south).
  • Talk to 'Beefy' Burns on the lowest level of the ship.
  • Talk to 'Lecherous' Lee at the very top-rear of the ship.
  • Talk to First mate 'Davey-boy', on the deck level, south room.
  • Climb back up to the top, talk to the Cabin boy (2 inventory spaces required).

Searching for clues[edit | edit source]

  • Use the emerald lens on the bullseye lantern you brought. Light it with your tinderbox.
    • If you didn't bring a lightable lantern, you can make lamp oil in Rimmington and add it to the bullseye lantern (unf) given by the Cabin boy, after using the emerald lens on it. If you lose your emerald lens for any reason, you can ask the Cabin boy for another one.
    • If you still own a sapphire lantern from the Tears of Guthix quest, you can use the emerald lens on the sapphire lantern.
  • Use the lantern on the following objects, and rub away the symbols:
    • Cannon: Eastern cannon a few steps away (same level as Cabin boy).
    • Wallchart: Climb down the stairs, southern-most room (on the wall north of the big table).
    • Chest: Lowest level of the ship, northern chest.
    • Support pillar: Also lowest level, just north of Beefy Burns, the cook.
    • Crate: Directly east of the cooking range.
  • Talk to Captain Bentley.

Lunar Isle[edit | edit source]

Items needed for this part of the quest: Guam leaf, marrentill, a pestle and mortar, seal of passage, and combat equipment and food for Suqah. There is a bank available on the island.

  • Climb down the ladders and walk into the city (there will be a small cut-scene).
  • Run out of the city to the south-east part of the island. Talk to the Oneiromancer.
  • Kill Suqah (safespottable), until you've received a suqah tooth. Keep any hides you get as drops (you will need a total of 4 hides later in the quest, which you can also collect later).
  • Return to the city, northern section. Enter the chicken house and talk to Baba Yaga (1 inventory space required). ( 2)…
    2The Oneiromancer told me you may be able to help...
  • Exit the house and use the vial on a nearby water source.
    • Add the guam and marrentill to your vial.
    • Ironmen: If you have guam and marrentill to get rid of, now is a good time do so for Herblore experience (~10,000 xp/hr). Destroy the vial after creating the guam-marr vial, reobtain one from Baba Yaga, and repeat.
    • Grind the Suqah tooth and use it on the vial to complete the potion.
  • Return to the Oneiromancer with the potion.

Lunar Staff[edit | edit source]

Items needed for this part of the quest: Dramen staff, (air, fire, water, and earth talisman) or (air, fire, water, and earth tiara) or (elemental talisman) or access to the Abyss. recommended: amulet of glory or ring of dueling (if doing via abyss)

Note: if using fairy rings, you can not use lunar staves for fairy ring transport at this point in the quest.

  • Use your Dramen staff/staves on the following altars in order:
    • Air Altar (south of Falador).
    • Fire Altar (north of Al-Kharid entrance of duel arena).
    • Water Altar (Lumbridge Swamp).
    • Earth Altar (north-east of Varrock).
  • Travel back to Lunar Isle and give the Lunar staff to the Oneiromancer. Do not forget to bring your seal of passage.

Ceremonial clothes[edit | edit source]

Items needed for this part of the quest: 400 coins, Seal of passage, a pickaxe, hammer, a needle, 2 thread, a spade, 4 Suqah hide, and combat equipment and food for Suqah

Mining the stalagmite for the helm.
  • In the north-eastern part of the isle, climb down ladder to the Lunar Mine.
  • Mine a stalagmite for 1 lunar ore. Grab three extra ores to save time during The Fremennik Exiles quest.
  • Smelt the ore at a furnace to receive a lunar bar (closest furnace and anvil is in Rellekka).
  • With a hammer, use the bar on an anvil to make the helm.
  • Go back to the Lunar Isle.
  • North-west in the city, talk to Pauline Polaris (1 inventory space required) Note: The chat options appear in a random order when guessing her real name. First guess must be Pauline. Pick the option that says "Jane Blud-Hagic-Maid."
  • South in the city, talk to Meteora.
  • Kill Suqahs until one drops a special tiara. Keep up to 4 hides the Suqahs drop. Make sure you have at least 4 hides.
  • Give Meteora the tiara.
  • South of the bank, talk to Rimae Sirsalis about ceremonial clothes. ( 2)…
    2You know the ceremonial clothes?
  • Talk to Rimae Sirsalis again, she will tan your hides. ( 2•1)…
    2You know the ceremonial clothes?
    1That seems like a fair deal.
  • Craft a Lunar torso, trousers, gloves and boots from your hides.
Lunar ring location
  • Centre of the city, talk to Selene. ( 2)…
    2I'm looking for a ring.
  • Exit the city and run south then west past the two bridges. With your spade, dig up the blue flowers furthest west to receive the lunar ring. (You must click continue on the chatbox!)
  • Give the Oneiromancer all your lunar gear. She will then give you all the items back, if you do not have 11 inventory spaces free, you CANNOT continue.

Dreamville[edit | edit source]

Items needed for this part of the quest: Tinderbox, axe (optional), Seal of passage, kindling, lunar gear, Waking sleep vial, combat spells to fight Me (level 79), food (recommended)

  • Use the vial on the kindling you received.
  • Get your combat runes and supplies and wear all your lunar items (but do NOT bank your seal of passage). 4 inventory spaces are required.
  • Enter a long building on the western side of the village that has a ceremonial brazier and a staircase inside.
  • Light the ceremonial brazier then use the kindling on it.
  • Talk to the Ethereal NPC.
  • If you logout during the dream state you will have to speak to the Oneiromancer again to retrieve your potion and kindling.

Dicing[edit | edit source]

  • Step on the south-western yellow platform.
  • Talk to Ethereal Fluke.
  • He will call out a number, you need to make the dice add up to the number he called. Roll the dice for the numbers in the answer that are not on the dice. E.g. for number 12, roll any dice that are numbers 4, 5 or 6.
Number Answer
12 1, 1, 2, 2, 3, 3
13 1, 1, 2, 2, 3, 4
14 1, 1, 2, 2, 4, 4
15 1, 1, 2, 5, 3, 3
16 1, 1, 2, 5, 3, 4
17 1, 1, 2, 5, 4, 4
18 1, 1, 5, 5, 3, 3
19 1, 1, 5, 5, 3, 4
20 1, 1, 5, 5, 4, 4
21 1, 6, 2, 5, 3, 4
22 1, 6, 2, 5, 4, 4
23 1, 6, 5, 5, 3, 3
24 1, 6, 5, 5, 3, 4
25 1, 6, 5, 5, 4, 4
26 6, 6, 2, 5, 3, 4
27 6, 6, 2, 5, 4, 4
28 6, 6, 5, 5, 3, 3
29 6, 6, 5, 5, 3, 4
30 6, 6, 5, 5, 4, 4
  • He will teleport you back to the centre area after 5-6 correct answers.
  • Talk to the Ethereal Man/Lady.

Number sequence[edit | edit source]

  • Step on the south-eastern pink platform.
  • Talk to Ethereal Numerator.
  • Click on the numbers to complete the patterns:
Sequence Answer
0, 1, 3, 4 6, 7
1, 1, 1, 2, 1, 3, 1, 4 1, 5
1, 1, 2, 2, 3 3, 4
1, 1, 2, 3, 1, 1, 4 5, 1
1, 2, 3 4, 5
1, 3, 5 7, 9
1, 4, 2, 5 3, 6
1, 6, 2, 5 3, 4
1, 9, 2, 8 3, 7
2, 3, 5, 6 8, 9
2, 6, 3, 7 4, 8
3, 4, 2, 5 1, 6
7, 3, 6, 2 5, 1
8, 6, 4 2, 0
9, 7, 5 3, 1
9, 8, 7, 6 5, 4
  • He eventually teleports you back to the middle.
  • Talk to the Ethereal NPC.

Logging race[edit | edit source]

  • Step on the north-eastern blue platform.
  • Talk to Ethereal Perceptive. If you don't have an axe, he'll give you one. ( 1)…
    1Ok, let's go!
  • Run west and chop 20 logs, depositing them on your log pile.
  • He will teleport you once you've won the competition.
  • Talk to the Ethereal NPC.

Memorization[edit | edit source]

  • Step on the north-western grey platform.
  • Talk to Ethereal Guide.
  • Cross the chasm by jumping on the correct combination of Dream Puffs. Keep a note of the correct steps!

Patterns are when facing north.

  • Once complete, talk to the Ethereal NPC.

The race[edit | edit source]

  • Step on the eastern yellow platform.
  • Talk to Ethereal Expert and start the race. ( 1)…
    1Ok.
  • Turn on run, and keep it on while jumping the hurdles.
  • Jump over the Hurdles. If you fail 3 times you will lose the race.
  • After you have won talk to the Ethereal NPC.

Copy cat[edit | edit source]

  • Step on the south-eastern green platform.
  • Talk to Ethereal Mimic. ( 1)…
    1Suppose I may as well have a go.
  • Click on him, then copy the emote that he performs. He teleports after each correct emote.
  • After 5 correct emotes, he'll teleport you back.

Defeating Me[edit | edit source]

  • Talk to the Ethereal NPC to begin the final fight. ( 1)…
    1Of course. I'm ready.
  • Kill Me (level 79, safespottable).
    • You cannot equip any different equipment when fighting Me, however you can bring combat runes to make the fight drastically easier. A tome of fire or any shield slot item can be used if equipped before entering the dream.

Finishing up[edit | edit source]

  • Read the lectern to return to Lunar Isle.
  • With the seal of passage equipped or in your inventory talk to the Oneiromancer.

Congratulations! Quest complete!

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • 2 Quest points
  • 5,000 Magic experience
  • 5,000 Runecraft experience
  • A seal of passage
  • Access to Lunar Isle and Lunar equipment
  • Access to the Lunar spellbook
  • Access to the Astral Altar
  • 50 Astral runes

If you do not, you will be teleported off of the isle if you try to talk to any [[NPC]]. The lantern given during the quest does not come with oil in it, '''so bring a lightable regular [[bullseye lantern]]'''. If you put the emerald lens in the given lantern, drop it and ask for a new lens, which you then use on your working brought bullseye lantern. ===Starting out=== '''''Items needed for this part of the quest:''' [[Tinderbox]], [[Bullseye lantern]] (one that you can light).'' Yar! Let's be on our way, yar!}} *Climb the ladders, and board the pirate ship. Talk to [[Captain Bentley]] about sailing to Lunar Isle. {{Chat option|4Can we sail to Lunar Isle now?}} *Speak to Captain Bentley again. *Climb down the nearby south stairs through the door, talk to [['Birds-Eye' Jack]]. *Climb back up the stairs and talk to Captain Bentley again. {{Chat option|2Perhaps it's the Navigator's fault?}} *Climb back down the stairs and return to 'Birds-Eye' Jack again. *Climb back up the stairs and report back to Captain Bentley. }} ===Talking to the crew=== '''''NOTE:''' MUST talk to them in order.'' {{Checklist| *Talk to [['Eagle-eye' Shultz]] at the very front (north-end) of the ship. *Talk to the [[Cabin boy]] up one deck from the captain (south). *Talk to [['Beefy' Burns]] on the lowest level of the ship. *Talk to [['Lecherous' Lee]] at the very top-rear of the ship. *Talk to [[First mate 'Davey-boy']], on the deck level, south room. *Climb back up to the top, talk to the [[Cabin boy]] (2 inventory spaces required). }} ===Searching for clues=== {{Checklist| *Use the [[emerald lens]] on the [[bullseye lantern]] you brought. Light it with your tinderbox. **If you didn't bring a lightable lantern, you can make [[lamp oil]] in [[Rimmington]] and add it to the bullseye lantern (unf) given by the Cabin boy, after using the emerald lens on it. If you lose your emerald lens for any reason, you can ask the Cabin boy for another one. **If you still own a sapphire lantern from the [[Tears of Guthix]] quest, you can use the emerald lens on the sapphire lantern. *Use the lantern on the following objects, and rub away the symbols: **'''Cannon''': Eastern cannon a few steps away (same level as Cabin boy). **'''Wallchart''': Climb down the stairs, southern-most room (on the wall north of the big table). **'''Chest''': Lowest level of the ship, northern chest. **'''Support pillar''': Also lowest level, just north of Beefy Burns, the cook. **'''Crate''': Directly east of the cooking range. *Talk to Captain Bentley. }} ===Lunar Isle=== '''''Items needed for this part of the quest:''' [[Guam leaf]], [[marrentill]], a [[pestle and mortar]], [[seal of passage]], and combat equipment and food for Suqah. There is a bank available on the island.'' {{Checklist| *Climb down the ladders and walk into the city (there will be a small cut-scene). *Run out of the city to the south-east part of the island. Talk to the [[Oneiromancer]]. *Kill [[Suqah]] (safespottable), until you've received a [[suqah tooth]]. Keep any hides you get as drops (you will need a total of 4 hides later in the quest, which you can also collect later). *Return to the city, northern section. Enter the chicken house and talk to [[Baba Yaga]] (1 inventory space required). {{Chat option|2The Oneiromancer told me you may be able to help...}} *Exit the house and use the vial on a nearby water source. **Add the guam and marrentill to your vial. **''Ironmen: If you have guam and marrentill to get rid of, now is a good time do so for Herblore experience (~10,000 xp/hr). Destroy the vial after creating the guam-marr vial, reobtain one from Baba Yaga, and repeat.'' **Grind the [[Suqah tooth]] and use it on the vial to complete the potion. *Return to the [[Oneiromancer]] with the potion. }} ===Lunar Staff=== '''''Items needed for this part of the quest:''' [[Dramen staff]], ([[Air talisman|air]], [[Fire talisman|fire]], [[Water talisman|water]], and [[earth talisman]]) or ([[Air tiara|air]], [[Fire tiara|fire]], [[Water tiara|water]], and [[earth tiara]]) or ([[elemental talisman]]) or access to the [[Abyss]]. '''recommended:''' amulet of glory or ring of dueling (if doing via abyss)'' '''Note:''' if using fairy rings, you '''can not''' use lunar staves for fairy ring transport at this point in the quest. {{Checklist| *Use your Dramen staff/staves on the following altars '''in order''': **[[Air Altar]] (south of [[Falador]]). **[[Fire Altar]] (north of [[Al-Kharid]] entrance of duel arena). **[[Water Altar]] ([[Lumbridge Swamp]]). **[[Earth Altar]] (north-east of [[Varrock]]). *Travel back to Lunar Isle and give the [[Lunar staff]] to the [[Oneiromancer]]. Do not forget to bring your seal of passage. }} ===Ceremonial clothes=== '''''Items needed for this part of the quest:''' 400 [[coins]], ''[[Seal of passage]], ''a [[pickaxe]], [[hammer]], a [[needle]], 2 [[thread]], a [[spade]], 4 [[Suqah hide]], and combat equipment and food for Suqah'' [[File:Mining stalagmite.png|thumb|220px|Mining the stalagmite for the [[Lunar helm|helm]].]]{{Checklist| *In the north-eastern part of the isle, climb down ladder to the Lunar Mine. *Mine a [[stalagmite]] for 1 [[lunar ore]]. Grab three extra ores to save time during [[The Fremennik Exiles]] quest. *Smelt the ore at a furnace to receive a [[lunar bar]] (closest furnace and anvil is in Rellekka). *With a hammer, use the bar on an anvil to make the helm. *Go back to the Lunar Isle. *North-west in the city, talk to [[Pauline Polaris]] (1 inventory space required) '''Note: The chat options appear in a random order when guessing her real name.''' First guess must be Pauline. Pick the option that says '''"Jane Blud-Hagic-Maid."''' *South in the city, talk to [[Meteora]]. *Kill [[Suqahs]] until one drops [[a special tiara]]. Keep up to 4 hides the Suqahs drop. Make sure you have at least 4 hides. *Give Meteora the tiara. *South of the bank, talk to [[Rimae Sirsalis]] about ceremonial clothes. {{Chat option|2You know the ceremonial clothes?}} *Talk to [[Rimae Sirsalis]] again, she will tan your hides. {{Chat option|2You know the ceremonial clothes?|1That seems like a fair deal.}} *Craft a Lunar torso, trousers, gloves and boots from your hides. [[File:Lunar ring location.png|thumb|300px|[[Lunar ring]] location]] *Centre of the city, talk to [[Selene]]. {{Chat option|2I'm looking for a ring.}} *Exit the city and run south then west past the two bridges. With your spade, dig up the blue flowers furthest west to receive the lunar ring. (You must click continue on the chatbox!) *Give the Oneiromancer all your lunar gear. She will then give you all the items back, if you do not have 11 inventory spaces free, you CANNOT continue.}} ===Dreamville=== '''''Items needed for this part of the quest:''' [[Tinderbox]], axe (optional), Seal of passage, kindling, lunar gear, Waking sleep vial, [[combat spells]] to fight [[Me]] (level 79), food (recommended)'' {{Checklist| *Use the vial on the kindling you received. *Get your combat runes and supplies and '''wear all your lunar items (but do NOT bank your seal of passage)'''. 4 inventory spaces are required. *Enter a long building on the western side of the village that has a ceremonial brazier and a staircase inside. *Light the ceremonial brazier then use the kindling on it. *Talk to the Ethereal NPC. *If you logout during the dream state you will have to speak to the Oneiromancer again to retrieve your potion and kindling. }} ====Dicing==== {{Checklist| *Step on the south-western yellow platform. *Talk to Ethereal Fluke. *He will call out a number, you need to make the dice add up to the number he called. Roll the dice for the numbers in the answer that are not on the dice. E.g. for number 12, roll any dice that are numbers 4, 5 or 6. }} {|class="wikitable lighttable" style="text-align:center;" !Number !Answer |- |'''12'''||1, 1, 2, 2, 3, 3 |- |'''13'''||1, 1, 2, 2, 3, 4 |- |'''14'''||1, 1, 2, 2, 4, 4 |- |'''15'''||1, 1, 2, 5, 3, 3 |- |'''16'''||1, 1, 2, 5, 3, 4 |- |'''17'''||1, 1, 2, 5, 4, 4 |- |'''18'''||1, 1, 5, 5, 3, 3 |- |'''19'''||1, 1, 5, 5, 3, 4 |- |'''20'''||1, 1, 5, 5, 4, 4 |- |'''21'''||1, 6, 2, 5, 3, 4 |- |'''22'''||1, 6, 2, 5, 4, 4 |- |'''23'''||1, 6, 5, 5, 3, 3 |- |'''24'''||1, 6, 5, 5, 3, 4 |- |'''25'''||1, 6, 5, 5, 4, 4 |- |'''26'''||6, 6, 2, 5, 3, 4 |- |'''27'''||6, 6, 2, 5, 4, 4 |- |'''28'''||6, 6, 5, 5, 3, 3 |- |'''29'''||6, 6, 5, 5, 3, 4 |- |'''30'''||6, 6, 5, 5, 4, 4 |} {{Checklist| *He will teleport you back to the centre area after 5-6 correct answers. *Talk to the Ethereal Man/Lady. }} ====Number sequence==== {{Checklist| *Step on the south-eastern pink platform. *Talk to Ethereal Numerator. *Click on the numbers to complete the patterns: }} {|class="wikitable lighttable" style="text-align:center;" !Sequence !Answer |- |'''0, 1, 3, 4'''||6, 7 |- |'''1, 1, 1, 2, 1, 3, 1, 4'''||1, 5 |- |'''1, 1, 2, 2, 3'''||3, 4 |- |'''1, 1, 2, 3, 1, 1, 4'''||5, 1 |- |'''1, 2, 3'''||4, 5 |- |'''1, 3, 5'''||7, 9 |- |'''1, 4, 2, 5'''||3, 6 |- |'''1, 6, 2, 5'''||3, 4 |- |'''1, 9, 2, 8'''||3, 7 |- |'''2, 3, 5, 6'''||8, 9 |- |'''2, 6, 3, 7'''||4, 8 |- |'''3, 4, 2, 5'''||1, 6 |- |'''7, 3, 6, 2'''||5, 1 |- |'''8, 6, 4'''||2, 0 |- |'''9, 7, 5'''||3, 1 |- |'''9, 8, 7, 6'''||5, 4 |} {{Checklist| *He eventually teleports you back to the middle. *Talk to the Ethereal NPC. }} ====Logging race==== {{Checklist|*Step on the north-eastern blue platform. *Talk to Ethereal Perceptive. If you don't have an axe, he'll give you one. {{Chat option|1Ok, let's go!}} *Run west and chop 20 logs, depositing them on your log pile. *He will teleport you once you've won the competition. *Talk to the Ethereal NPC. }} ====Memorization==== {{Checklist| *Step on the north-western grey platform. *Talk to Ethereal Guide. *Cross the chasm by jumping on the correct combination of Dream Puffs. Keep a note of the correct steps! }} {|class="underpasstable" |{{#vardefineecho:table|
}} |{{#var:table}} |{{#var:table}} |{{#var:table}} |} Patterns are when facing '''north'''. {| |- | {| |- | {| class="wikitable" |+Path 1 | style="width:12px;" | | style="width:12px;" |X | style="width:12px;" |X | style="width:12px;" | | style="width:12px;" | |- | |X |X |X |- | | | |X |- | | | |X |- | |X |X |X |- | |X | | |- | |X |X | |- | | |X | |} |} {{Checklist| *Once complete, talk to the Ethereal NPC. }} ====The race==== {{Checklist| *Step on the eastern yellow platform. *Talk to Ethereal Expert and start the race. {{Chat option|1Ok.}} *Turn on run, and keep it on while jumping the hurdles. *Jump over the Hurdles. If you fail 3 times you will lose the race. *After you have won talk to the Ethereal NPC. }} ====Copy cat==== {{Checklist| *Step on the south-eastern green platform. *Talk to Ethereal Mimic. {{Chat option|1Suppose I may as well have a go.}} *Click on him, then copy the emote that he performs. He teleports after each correct emote. *After 5 correct emotes, he'll teleport you back. }} ====Defeating Me==== {{Checklist| *Talk to the Ethereal NPC to begin the final fight. {{Chat option|1Of course. I'm ready.}} *Kill [[Me]] (level 79, safespottable). **You cannot equip any different equipment when fighting Me, however you can bring combat runes to make the fight drastically easier. A tome of fire or any shield slot item can be used if equipped before entering the dream. }} ===Finishing up=== {{Checklist| *Read the lectern to return to Lunar Isle. *With the seal of passage equipped or in your inventory talk to the [[Oneiromancer]]. }} '''Congratulations! Quest complete!''' ==Rewards== {{Quest rewards page|Lunar Diplomacy}} {{Lunar Diplomacy}}
